ðŸ“– Summary: Raijin is a free and simple terminal-based weather application (TUI) written in Rust. It retrieves weather data from NWS and OpenMeteo, and moon phase data from ViewBits, without requiring API keys, accounts, or subscriptions. Currently, it supports macOS and Linux operating systems.
